title: Yorke Peninsula
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Ron Saunders
brief_description: The sea in its various moods is the central “character” in this exploration of the scenery and recreational opportunities of Yorke Peninsula in South Australia. The agricultural and mining background of this region adds a further dimension to its natural pleasures.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation and Ron Saunders
